{"step_by_step_thinking": "Functional appliances are used in orthodontics to modify the growth of the jaw and facial bones. The Activator, Bionator, and Twin block are all tooth-borne appliances, meaning they rely on the teeth for support. The Frankel appliance, on the other hand, is a tissue-borne appliance, meaning it relies on the soft tissues and muscles of the mouth for support.", "answer_choice": "D. Frankel"}
